analysis.description:
digithothToken.startDate (/unique_chucks/21/0x26fa4ab937bf885d06cfb3eabb89eeef9af1978a.sol#112) is never initialized. It is used in:
	- fallback (/unique_chucks/21/0x26fa4ab937bf885d06cfb3eabb89eeef9af1978a.sol#222-239)

Detected issues with version pragma in /unique_chucks/21/0x26fa4ab937bf885d06cfb3eabb89eeef9af1978a.sol:
	- pragma solidity^0.4.18 (/unique_chucks/21/0x26fa4ab937bf885d06cfb3eabb89eeef9af1978a.sol#1): it allows old versions
Parameter '_newOwner' of Owned.transferOwnership (/unique_chucks/21/0x26fa4ab937bf885d06cfb3eabb89eeef9af1978a.sol#89) is not in mixedCase
